values.desc: IDNA option to check for whether the input conforms to the BiDi rules.
IDNA option to check for whether the input conforms to the CONTEXTJ rules.
IDNA option to check for whether the input conforms to the CONTEXTO rules.
Default options value: None of the other options are set.
IDNA option for nontransitional processing in ToASCII().
IDNA option for nontransitional processing in ToUnicode().
Option to check whether the input conforms to the STD3 ASCII rules, for example the restriction of labels to LDH characters (ASCII Letters, Digits and Hyphen-Minus).
Returns an IDNA instance which implements UTS #46.

values.code: labelToASCII(label: CharSequence!, dest: StringBuilder!, info: IDNA.Info!)
values.desc: Converts a single domain name label into its ASCII form for DNS lookup.

values.code: labelToUnicode(label: CharSequence!, dest: StringBuilder!, info: IDNA.Info!)
values.desc: Converts a single domain name label into its Unicode form for human-readable display.

values.code: nameToASCII(name: CharSequence!, dest: StringBuilder!, info: IDNA.Info!)
values.desc: Converts a whole domain name into its ASCII form for DNS lookup.

values.code: nameToUnicode(name: CharSequence!, dest: StringBuilder!, info: IDNA.Info!)
values.desc: Converts a whole domain name into its Unicode form for human-readable display.
Output container for IDNA processing errors.
